T02D2536:30b-23: mdog dkar zhal drug mnyam gzhag autpala po tis mtshan //
T02D2536:30b-24: mdog dkar aa ra pa tsa rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D2536:30b-25: mdog mthing sdug bsngal gcod ni rdo rje ral gri'o //
T02D2536:30b-26: mdog dkar shes rab ye shes 'khor lo autpala lo //
T02D2536:30b-27: mdog ser ngag gi dbang phyug rin chen ral gri'o //
T02D2536:30b-28: mdog dmar rdo rje rnon po ral gri padma'o //
T02D2536:30b-29: mdog ljang ye shes sku ni rgya gram ral gri'o //
T02D2536:30b-30: rab tu rdo rje 'khor lo dang ni padma'o //
T02D2536:30b-31: rdo rje padma rin po che dang ral gri'o //
T02D2536:30b-32: chos kyi phyag rgya 'od las de 'byung drug po ni //
T02D2536:30b-33: pha rol drug ldan sangs rgyas drug gi mtshan ni spro //
T02D2536:30b-34: da ni mtshan don bshad pa ni /
T02D2536:30b-35: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D2536:30b-36: ces bya ba'i tshig bzhi pas gsang ba'i yum bstan te /
T02D2536:30b-37: phung po'i bdud bcom pa ni khong nas rang 'byung gi mes bsregs te /
T02D2536:30b-38: tshig tu brjod pa spangs nas smra brjod kyi yul las 'das pa'o //
T02D2536:30b-39: dpa' bo'i sde dang rab tu 'joms //
T02D2536:30b-42: ri rab mtshan dang zhes bya bas yum bzhi'i mtshan no //
T02D2536:31a-1: sangs rgyas te dang po'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2536:31a-2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D2536:31a-3: ye shes sems dpa' sa bon dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2536:31a-5: mar me mdzad dang sman gyi bla //
T02D2536:31a-6: des dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan no //
T02D2536:31a-7: skye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston pa ni /
T02D2536:31a-8: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D2536:31a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D2536:31a-12: chos sku spros med de las gzugs sku dang po'i
T02D2536:31a-13: sangs rgyas dug lnga rnam par dag pa 'byung ba
T02D2536:31a-14: ni / mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che nas /
T02D2536:31a-15: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mthar nub
T02D2536:31a-16: phyogs bde ba can du gdul bya chags pa'i sku
T02D2536:31a-19: tshangs pa'i mtshan dang rgyun du gnas //
T02D2536:31a-20: byams pa'i stobs dang ri rab brtsegs //
T02D2536:31a-21: rnam par gnon dang rin chen snang //
T02D2536:31a-22: yid dge ba dang 'od dpag med //
T02D2536:31a-23: nam mkha'i mdzod dang padma'i zhabs //
T02D2536:31a-24: dkon mchog brtsegs dang rab zhi 'od //
T02D2536:31a-25: gtsug tor can dang dpe bral thugs //
T02D2536:31a-26: 'od zer shar dang dkon nas dri //
T02D2536:31a-29: 'dod pa chen po bde ba ches gdul bya yul zhi ba ni sems dpa' bzhi ste /
T02D2536:31a-30: sgra'i rnam shes rang bzhin no //
T02D2536:31a-31: gzugs che lus kyang nas spangs pa'i mthar sku rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D2536:31a-32: dri'i rnam shes rang bzhin gyi sems dpa' bzhi'o //
T02D2536:31a-33: shes rab mtshon chen nas gsal nga che zhes bya
T02D2536:31a-34: bas ni ro'i rnam shes rang bzhin gyi sems dpa'
T02D2536:31a-36: mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul nas mig 'phrul can gyi mthar reg bya'i rnam shes rang bzhin te /
T02D2536:31a-37: sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2536:31a-38: de yang gzugs dang kha dog dang mtshan phyag na
T02D2536:31a-39: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgra grags pas gshin rje
T02D2536:31a-40: la sogs pa 'byer bar byed pa des bde ba
T02D2536:31a-41: chen po'i gnas padma'i 'dab ma 'dod pa chen po
T02D2536:31a-42: dang po'i sangs rgyas la bskor zhing de yang dpag
T02D2536:31a-43: tu med pa dang thabs cig ste /
T02D2536:31b-0: yangs pa'i bdag nyid can drag @31b pos 'dul ba'i sku ste /
T02D2536:31b-2: phyag gi 'od dang thugs rje can //
T02D2536:31b-4: chu yi lha dang tsandan phyag / yongs su dag dang dag pa'i zhing //
T02D2536:31b-5: 'od kyi snang dang snang ba'i dpal //
T02D2536:31b-6: rin chen phyag dang padma'i phyag /'od zer bzang dang nyi zer 'od //
T02D2536:31b-7: drag po'i bde dang shugs phyung dang //
T02D2536:31b-8: spyan bzang po dang thugs kyi spyan //
T02D2536:31b-9: bdud sde 'joms dang nyon mongs sel //
T02D2536:31b-10: nam mkha'i 'od dang klu dbang rgyal //
T02D2536:31b-13: 'od kyis snang ba dang gsal bas skyo ba dang ldan nas lam la bkod de /
T02D2536:31b-14: 'dzam bu'i gling du byon nas spyod pa mdzad pa ni /
T02D2536:31b-15: sbyin bdag ces bya ba ste /
T02D2536:31b-16: 'khor los sgyur ba'i longs spyod spangs pa dang //
T02D2536:31b-17: khab dang 'khor dang yab yum spangs te tshul khrims dang /
T02D2536:31b-18: thams cad bzod pas yid mi g-yo ba la zhugs pas ni nyon mongs pa spangs pa ste /
T02D2536:31b-19: brtson 'grus la sogs pa bzhi'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2536:31b-20: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin lha mo rnam pa bzhi dag go //
T02D2536:31b-21: bsam gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam ni /
T02D2536:31b-22: sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg gi rang bzhin lha mo bzhi'o //
T02D2536:31b-23: stobs ni nam mkha'i khams dang ming gi rnam shes
T02D2536:31b-24: kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i lcags kyu dang zhags
T02D2536:31b-25: pa'o // ye shes rgya mtsho ni gzugs kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin lcags sgrog dang dril bu'o //
T02D2536:31b-26: nyon mongs chags pa'i bdud 'joms pas so //
T02D2536:31b-27: rdzu 'phrul mdzod dang yongs su dge / yid dge ba dang ri rab lha //
T02D2536:31b-28: byams pa'i stobs dang dga' bas sbyin //
T02D2536:31b-29: rab grol mdzad dang mi mnyam gzigs //
T02D2536:31b-30: phyogs med mdzad dang kun bskyod mdzad //
T02D2536:31b-31: snang ba'i stobs dang stong pa'i rgyal //
T02D2536:31b-32: ye shes spyan lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2536:31b-33: ye shes stobs dang rgya mtsho sprin //
T02D2536:31b-36: tshul gyi mchog ces bya bas ni rang don grub
T02D2536:31b-37: nas gzhan don du zhus pa ni rgyu rnam pa
T02D2536:31b-38: gnyis kyis blo phul du byung bas rang don shes
T02D2536:31b-39: pa ji lta ba la mkhas pa gzhan don ji
T02D2536:31b-40: snyed pa ste / thabs che ba bsam pa'o //
T02D2536:31b-41: lus te rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa ston te /
T02D2536:32a-1: drug po thams cad la khyab pa ste /
T02D2536:32a-2: dper na yid gcig du mar snang ba dang 'dra
T02D2536:32a-3: ba'i rdzu 'phrul de yang khyad par can pha rol
T02D2536:32a-4: zil gyis gnon pa'i lus dang gdul dka' ba 'dul
T02D2536:32a-5: bar byed pa'i rdo rje mkhregs pa ma rig pa'i
T02D2536:32a-6: brag dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'joms
T02D2536:32a-7: pa 'dzin pas bcom ldan 'das thams cad las skyob
T02D2536:32a-8: pa'i rigs kyi mchog bla ma dam pa de la
T02D2536:32a-9: gsang sngags la mos shing theg pa chen po la
T02D2536:32a-10: gnas pa'i ched du theg pa'i mchog thob pa'i thabs
T02D2536:32a-11: zhus pa las / byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T02D2536:32a-12: rna ba'i dbang po'i rang bzhin bskal bzang bzhi'o //
T02D2536:32a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
T02D2536:32a-14: sna'i dbang po'i rang bzhin bskal pa bzang po bzhi ste go rims bzhin no //
T02D2536:32a-15: srid pa'i ri bo 'joms pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02D2536:32a-16: lce'i dbang po'i rang bzhin bskal pa bzang po bzhi'o //
T02D2536:32a-17: mgon po rigs mchog ni yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang /
T02D2536:32a-18: lus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bskal bzang bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2536:32a-19: rgyal ba'i bka' dang sprin gyi shugs //
T02D2536:32a-20: spyod lam zhi dang log lam sel //
T02D2536:32a-21: byams pa'i 'od dang spos kyi zhing //
T02D2536:32a-22: mtshan ma zhi dang mthon ka'i rtse //
T02D2536:32a-23: chos kyi sprin dang yon tan bde //
T02D2536:32a-24: 'phags pa'i lam dang dri ma bral //
T02D2536:32a-25: mchog tu dga' dang dri ma med //
T02D2536:32a-26: spyod yul spangs dang kun du 'phro //
T02D2536:32a-27: rgyal ba'i 'od dang phyag rgya can //
T02D2536:32a-28: zhes bya bas bskal bzang gi mtshan no //
T02D2536:32a-30: rtog pa gcig tu aa ra pa tsan zhes pa'o //
T02D2536:32a-31: tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi /
T02D2536:32a-32: mtshan brgyad cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D2536:32a-34: rang don grub pa des gzhan don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2536:32a-35: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ni dbus rnam
T02D2536:32a-36: par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag
T02D2536:32a-37: gnyis pa byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can no
T02D2536:32a-39: chos sku la brten rnam par snang mdzad sku /
T02D2536:32a-40: chos kyi dbyings la me long lta bu'i rang bzhin ni /
T02D2536:32a-41: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
T02D2536:32a-43: 'o na rgyu gang las 'byung zhe na /
T02D2536:32b-0: gsang sngags tshul @32b chen te thabs de las byung ba'o //
T02D2536:32b-1: gang 'byung na gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can de'o //
T02D2536:32b-2: 'o na de las gzhan gyis thob par byed pa gzhan med dam zhe na /
T02D2536:32b-3: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni thob pa dang /
T02D2536:32b-4: de la gnas pa de yang nyes pas ma gos pa'i tshul du bsgrubs pas ci 'byung zhe na /
T02D2536:32b-5: mgon pos bcu'i dbang phyug thob bo //
T02D2536:32b-6: de gdul bya gang la snang zhing ston zhe na /
T02D2536:32b-7: sa bcu la ni gnas pa po la ste go sla'o //
T02D2536:32b-8: seng ge dang ni gsal bar byed //
T02D2536:32b-9: thub pa dang ni me tog mchog / me tog mdzes dang spyan gsal dang //
T02D2536:32b-10: ded dpon kun dang chen po'i mchog / stobs po che dang rgyu skar rgyal //
T02D2536:32b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sman pa mchog / rgyan grags pa dang mtshan dang ni //
T02D2536:32b-12: 'od zer che dang rnam grol lus //
T02D2536:32b-13: rnam snang mdzad dang snying po nyi //
T02D2536:32b-15: mya ngan med dang skabs de bzhin //
T02D2536:32b-17: don rnams ston dang mar me mchog / rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan no //
T02D2536:32b-18: thog ma med pa spros med bdag / ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2536:32b-19: bden par zhes bya ba ni brjod bya ma yin par bstan /
T02D2536:32b-21: gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
T02D2536:32b-22: zhes bya ba ni gnyis snang med pas grub bo //
T02D2536:32b-23: 'o na gnyis su 'dod pa gang zhe na /
T02D2536:32b-24: gang zag dang chos ga zung ba dang 'dzin pa bdag dang bdag gi'o //
T02D2536:32b-25: de med par byed pas na bdag med ces bya bas so //
T02D2536:32b-26: 'bar ba bzang dang sman bzang po //
T02D2536:32b-27: mdzod pu 'dzin dang dpa' bo dang //
T02D2536:32b-28: brtan por gnas dang dpal mgon dang //
T02D2536:32b-29: mthong na dga' dang yon tan tog / sgra gcan byang sems sgra gcan dang //
T02D2536:32b-30: tshangs pa'i mtshan dang bstod pa'o //
T02D2536:32b-31: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis yum bzhi la bstod pa ste /
T02D2536:32b-32: dang po dang tha ma la gnyis gnyis /
T02D2536:32b-33: bar ma gnyis la re re'o //
T02D2536:32b-35: bdag med ces pa'i don gyi stobs kyis sems dpa' bzhi ste /
T02D2536:32b-36: bar ma la ni gnyis su brjod //
T02D2536:32b-37: kun du 'gro zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2536:32b-38: yid ltar mgyogs zhes bya ba'i mthar sprul sku'i yid
T02D2536:32b-39: kyi stobs kyis 'jug / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
T02D2536:32b-40: bya ba nas stobs po che zhes bya ba'i mthar
T02D2536:33a-1: bzhir brjod de dang po la gnyis /
T02D2536:33a-2: phyi ma la go rims bzhin no //
T02D2536:33a-3: tshogs kyi slob dpon zhes bya ba nas 'dzin pa ste shes pa'i mthar las kyi bzhi ste /
T02D2536:33a-4: dang po la gnyis tha ma la re re go rims bzhin no //
T02D2536:33a-5: tshul chen dring mi 'jog ni mnyam par rtogs shing
T02D2536:33a-6: tshig gi nyes pas ma gos pas tshig la dbang
T02D2536:33a-7: thob pas snyan pa'i gsung go rims bzhin du padma'i
T02D2536:33a-8: sems dpa' bzhi la bstod pa'o //
T02D2536:33a-9: tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang tshig brtan pa //
T02D2536:33a-11: chen po ri dang rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2536:33a-12: rgyal ba'i mtshan dang 'jigs byed pa //
T02D2536:33a-13: rin po che dang padma dang //
T02D2536:33a-14: sde yi stobs dang me tog 'od //
T02D2536:33a-15: don yod mthong dang dpa' bo sbyin //
T02D2536:33a-16: mi ldan pa dang seng rgyal mtshan //
T02D2536:33a-17: rgyal po dang ni chos mos dang //
T02D2536:33a-18: dga' ba'i rgyal dang don chags so //
T02D2536:33a-19: theg pa dman pa grol ba'am //
T02D2536:33a-20: bden pa bzhi don ston pas na //
T02D2536:33a-21: rig par ldan zhing rig pa'i mchog gis don yod grub pa la bstod pa'o //
T02D2536:33a-22: des ni sprul pa'i sku bstan to //
T02D2536:33a-23: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po dang bral ba'o //
T02D2536:33a-24: de ni don dam pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2536:33a-25: kun rdzob kyi ye shes bzhi byung ba'i phyir ye shes 'ba' zhig las 'byung ba'o ;
T02D2536:33a-26: / de ni shes rab las byung bas shes rab mtshon chen no //
T02D2536:33a-27: dam chos thugs rje chos rgyal ni shes rab ste /
T02D2536:33a-28: de dang ldan pa gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2536:33a-29: de las thams cad kyi snang ba bskyed pas na gsal bar ldan te /
T02D2536:33a-30: des ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la bstod pa'o //
T02D2536:33a-31: legs pa'i lam zhes pa nas gsang sngags 'dzin zhes
T02D2536:33a-32: pa'i mthar ni dang po lam phyin ci ma log
T02D2536:33a-34: shes bya ji lta ba shes pa dang /
T02D2536:33a-36: khams dang bag la nyal gyi khyad par shes dgos te /
T02D2536:33a-37: rtogs pa la rtog pa thams cad spangs shing don
T02D2536:33a-38: dam par kun rdzob tu lha'i sku sgyu mar snang
T02D2536:33a-39: ba las / dbyings de las yon tan zad mi shes pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bas na chos te /
T02D2536:33a-40: dbyings de las yon tan zad mi shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2536:33a-41: de lta bas na de ci'i phyir zhe na zad mi shes she na /
T02D2536:33b-0: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ldan @33b
T02D2536:33b-1: zhing dpag tu med pas na bsod nams bsags pa'i
T02D2536:33b-2: phyir dang ye shes kyi chogs dang ldan pa'i phyir
T02D2536:33b-3: ro // 'o na des gzhan gyi rgyud ji ltar rig ce na /
T02D2536:33b-4: shes rab kyis gtan la phab pa'am /
T02D2536:33b-5: ye shes rang la shar te ji lta bar rtogs pas kun rdzob sgyu ma ltar snang zhing /
T02D2536:33b-6: thugs rje ji snyed pa rig pa de ye shes
T02D2536:33b-7: las byung bas na ye shes ldan pa yod med
T02D2536:33b-8: shes so // de'i phyir de'i rgyur tshogs gnyis bstan
T02D2536:33b-9: pa'i phyir tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa las 'byung
T02D2536:33b-10: shes so // ngo // 'o na ji ltar tshogs de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2536:33b-11: rtag tu sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /
T02D2536:33b-12: khro ba las rgyal ba'i bzod ba dang /
T02D2536:33b-13: nyon mongs las rgyal zhing sems rnal du zhugs pa'i thabs te /
T02D2536:33b-14: tshul khrims dang ldan zhing bsam pa brtan po'i brtson 'grus dang /
T02D2536:33b-15: dmigs bya la rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan rnam par
T02D2536:33b-16: 'byed cing blo phul du phyin pa'i shes rab tshogs
T02D2536:33b-17: so // gsang sngags kyi dbang du byas nas dus
T02D2536:33b-18: rtag tu kun rdzob la brten pa'i lha'i sku dang
T02D2536:33b-20: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la brten nas don dam par lhan cig skyes ba blo'i mchog bsgom pa'o //
T02D2536:33b-21: 'o na yid mi g-yo zhing so so rang gis rig pa las 'bras bu ci zhe na /
T02D2536:33b-22: mchog gi 'bras bu sku gsum dang ngo bo nyid kyi sku 'byung ste /
T02D2536:33b-23: de la chos kyi dbang phyug nas thams cad spangs
T02D2536:33b-24: zhes pa'i mthar snang ba mtha' yas la bstod pa'o
T02D2536:33b-25: // rnam par mi rtog ces bya ba nas bsod
T02D2536:33b-26: nams ldan pa zhes bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D2536:33b-28: ye shes 'ba' zhig nas sku gsum 'chang zhes bya
T02D2536:33b-29: ba ni ye shes sems dpa'i sgo nas bstod pa'o
T02D2536:33b-30: // dga' bar mdzad dang chu yi lha //
T02D2536:33b-31: yon tan lag dang glang po'i spos //
T02D2536:33b-32: zla ba dang ni zla bar grags //
T02D2536:33b-33: glang chen stobs dang nor bu'i gtsug / drag po dang ni seng ge mchod //
T02D2536:33b-34: ngang pa'i 'gros dang don rnams rgyal //
T02D2536:33b-35: shes rab brtsegs dang legs par gnas //
T02D2536:33b-36: bdud rtsi shes dang lus bzang po //
T02D2536:33b-38: dka' thub gnas dang bkra shis 'byung //
T02D2536:33b-39: bden par smra dang padma dang //
T02D2536:33b-40: mi yi theg dang bde ba'i phyag / ye shes blo dang blo dri bral //
T02D2536:33b-41: tshangs sbyin dang ni rin chen mdzod //
T02D2536:34a-2: dbang phyug che dang blo gros grags //
T02D2536:34a-3: rnam par rol dang shes pa'i mchog /'od zer tshogs dang rin chen snying //
T02D2536:34a-4: grong khyer mthong dang zla ba tshes //
T02D2536:34a-5: yid kyi yul dang yon tan grags //
T02D2536:34a-6: zla ba'i bsil dang gsal ba dang //

T02D2536:47a-28: 'dis ni shes rab rnam gsum gyi blos dag pa
T02D2536:47a-29: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
T02D2536:47a-30: kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'jam pa'i dpal dh'i:
T02D2536:47a-31: gsung yongs su dag pa sku gsung thugs dag pa
T02D2536:47a-32: sa bon gsum gyis bsdus la de aar snying po
T02D2536:47a-33: 'dus so // rjes su yi rang ston pa ni //
T02D2536:47a-34: de nas zhes bya bas ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
T02D2536:47a-35: zhu ba po dang de rnams kyi bsam pa lus kyi bya ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2536:47a-36: yul khyad par can la bskor ba dang phyag la sogs pa ste /
T02D2536:47a-37: gus pa dang ldan pa'i zhu pa pos 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas bstod nas /
T02D2536:47a-38: bdag cag rnams ngo mtshar te /
T02D2536:47a-39: khro bo'i tshogs lnga brgya tham pa dang bcas pas
T02D2536:47a-40: gsang bstod nas ni zhes pa dag gi las so
T02D2536:47a-41: // mgon po ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2536:47a-42: bdag cag ni dag pa dang ma dag pa'o //
T02D2536:47a-43: legs te dag pa'i don du ste bdag cag go //
T02D2536:47a-44: legs zhes pa ni rnam par dag pa ste rnam grol zhes pa'o //
T02D2536:47b-0: rnam par dag pa'i lam @47b 'di lta bu gsungs pas so //
T02D2536:47b-1: de legs par cis shes she na /
T02D2536:47b-3: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2536:47b-4: don chen rang don dang gzhan don gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2536:47b-5: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2536:47b-6: de lta bas na 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod pa'i yum mo //
T02D2536:47b-7: de la brten nas 'byung zhing ma 'ongs pa la bstan pas na bshad ces bya'o //
T02D2536:47b-8: bla ma'i drin gyis yang dag thob //
T02D2536:47b-9: gus pas byin brlabs thugs rjes khyab //
T02D2536:47b-11: rgyud dang bla ma'i gsung las rnyed //
T02D2536:47b-12: brten nas bdag gis 'di byas pas //
T02D2536:47b-13: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
T02D2536:47b-14: 'jam dpal go 'phang thob par shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'grel pa bsdus pa'i gsal ba /
T02D2536:47b-15: au rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po aa ba dh'u t'i pas mdzad pa rdzogs so; ;
T02D2536:47b-16: // rgya grar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i mi tra dang /
T02D2536:47b-17: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi bzang
